3 from niryo_robot_poses_handlers.file_manager import FileManager, NiryoRobotFileException
4 from niryo_robot_poses_handlers.transform_functions import euler_from_matrix, quaternion_from_euler, normalize_quaterion
5 
6 from geometry_msgs.msg import Point, Vector3, TransformStamped, Quaternion
7 
8 import tf2_ros
9 import numpy as np
10 import rospy
11 
12 
13 class DynamicFrame(object):
14  """
15  """
16 
17  def __init__(self, name, description):
18  self.name = name
19  self.description = description
20  self.belong_to_workspace = False
21  self.robot_poses = []
22  self.static_transform_stamped = []
23 
24  def to_dict(self):
25  dict_ = dict()
26  dict_["name"] = self.name
27  dict_["description"] = self.description
28  dict_["belong_to_workspace"] = self.belong_to_workspace
29  dict_["static_transform_stamped"] = self.static_transform_stamped
30  return dict_
31 
32  @classmethod
33  def from_dict(cls, dict_):
34  dyn_frame = cls(dict_["name"], dict_["description"])
35  dyn_frame.belong_to_workspace = dict_["belong_to_workspace"]
36  dyn_frame.static_transform_stamped = dict_["static_transform_stamped"]
37 
38  return dyn_frame
39 
40  def get_value(self):
41  return self.static_transform_stamped, self.robot_poses

43 
44 class DynamicFrameManager(FileManager):
45  """
46  Manages the creation, storage and loading of dynamic frame.
47 
48  :raises NiryoRobotFileException:
49  """
50  object_type = DynamicFrame
51  dict_dynamic_frame = {}
52 
53  def __init__(self, ws_dir):
54  FileManager.__init__(self, ws_dir, "dynamic_frame")
55 
56  self.__publish_timer = None
57  self.__broadcaster = tf2_ros.TransformBroadcaster()
58 
59  @staticmethod
60  def __get_static_transform(name, points):
61  point_o = Point(*points[0])
62  point_vx = Point(*points[1])
63  point_vy = Point(*points[2])
64 
65  # Acquisition vector
66  vector_x = np.array([point_vx.x - point_o.x, point_vx.y - point_o.y, point_vx.z - point_o.z])
67  vector_y = np.array([point_vy.x - point_o.x, point_vy.y - point_o.y, point_vy.z - point_o.z])
68 
69  # Calculate normal vector vz
70  vector_z = np.cross(vector_x, vector_y)
71  if np.all(vector_z == 0):
72  raise NiryoRobotFileException("Frame can't be created because 3 points are aligned")
73  # Recalculate vector vy
74  vector_y = np.cross(vector_z, vector_x)
75 
76  # Normalize
77  vector_x = vector_x / np.linalg.norm(vector_x)
78  vector_y = vector_y / np.linalg.norm(vector_y)
79  vector_z = vector_z / np.linalg.norm(vector_z)
80 
81  # Calculate rotation matrix
82  rotation = np.eye(4)
83  rotation[:3, :3] = np.stack([vector_x, vector_y, vector_z]).T
84 
85  # Get quaternion
86  al, be, ga = euler_from_matrix(rotation)
87  q = quaternion_from_euler(al, be, ga)
88 
89  # Create frame
90  static_transform_stamped = TransformStamped()
91  static_transform_stamped.header.frame_id = "world"
92  static_transform_stamped.child_frame_id = name
93  # Position
94  static_transform_stamped.transform.translation = Vector3(*[point_o.x, point_o.y, point_o.z])
95  # Orientation
96  static_transform_stamped.transform.rotation = Quaternion(*q)
97 
98  return static_transform_stamped, [[point_o.x, point_o.y, point_o.z], q.tolist()]
99 
100  def create(self, name, points, description="", belong_to_workspace=False):
101  """
102  Create a new local frame
103  """
104  static_transform_stamped, transform_as_list = self.__get_static_transform(name, points)
105 
106  # Add to the list of publish transform
107  self.dict_dynamic_frame[name] = {"transform": static_transform_stamped}
108 
109  dynamic_frame = DynamicFrame(name, description)
110  dynamic_frame.points = points
111  dynamic_frame.belong_to_workspace = belong_to_workspace
112  dynamic_frame.static_transform_stamped = transform_as_list
113 
114  self._write(name, dynamic_frame)
115 
116  def edit_name(self, name, new_name):
117  self.check_exist(name)
118 
119  transform_stamped = self.dict_dynamic_frame.pop(name)
120  transform_stamped['transform'].child_frame_id = new_name
121  self.dict_dynamic_frame[new_name] = transform_stamped
122 
123  dynamic_frame = self.read(name)
124  FileManager.remove(self, name)
125  dynamic_frame.name = new_name
126  self._write(new_name, dynamic_frame)
127 
128  def edit_description(self, name, description):
129  self.check_exist(name)
130 
131  dynamic_frame = self.read(name)
132  dynamic_frame.description = description
133  self._write(name, dynamic_frame)
134 
135  def edit_points(self, name, points):
136  self.check_exist(name)
137 
138  static_transform_stamped, transform_as_list = self.__get_static_transform(name, points)
139 
140  # Add to the list of publish transform
141  self.dict_dynamic_frame[name] = {"transform": static_transform_stamped}
142 
143  dynamic_frame = self.read(name)
144  dynamic_frame.points = points
145  dynamic_frame.static_transform_stamped = transform_as_list
146  self._write(name, dynamic_frame)
147 
148  def edit_static_transform_w_rpy(self, name, position, rpy):
149  quaternion = Quaternion(*quaternion_from_euler(rpy.roll, rpy.pitch, rpy.yaw))
150  return self.edit_static_transform(name, position, quaternion)
151 
152  def edit_static_transform(self, name, position, quaternion):
153  self.check_exist(name)
154 
155  static_transform_stamped = TransformStamped()
156  static_transform_stamped.header.frame_id = "world"
157  static_transform_stamped.child_frame_id = name
158  # Position
159  static_transform_stamped.transform.translation = Vector3(*[position.x, position.y, position.z])
160 
161  # Orientation
162  normalized_quaterion = normalize_quaterion([quaternion.x, quaternion.y, quaternion.z, quaternion.w])
163  static_transform_stamped.transform.rotation = Quaternion(*normalized_quaterion)
164 
165  # Add to the list of publish transform
166  self.dict_dynamic_frame[name] = {"transform": static_transform_stamped}
167 
168  dynamic_frame = self.read(name)
169  # we set everything to 0 as we are not able to calculate the points from the transform
170  dynamic_frame.points = [[0] * 3] * 3
171  dynamic_frame.static_transform_stamped = [[position.x, position.y, position.z],
172  [quaternion.x, quaternion.y, quaternion.z, quaternion.z]]
173  self._write(name, dynamic_frame)
174 
175  def remove(self, name, belong_to_workspace=False):
176  """
177  Remove a frame
178  """
179  if not belong_to_workspace:
180  frame = self.read(name)
181  if frame.belong_to_workspace:
182  raise NiryoRobotFileException("Frame {} can't be removed because it belong to a workspace".format(name))
183 
184  self.check_exist(name)
185 
186  # Remove transform from publish transform list
187  self.dict_dynamic_frame.pop(name)
188  FileManager.remove(self, name)
189 
190  def restore_publisher(self):
191  """
192  Publish frame present in files
193  """
194  list_files = self.get_all_names()
195  for file in list_files:
196  frame = self.read(file)
197 
198  # Create frame
199  static_transform_stamped = TransformStamped()
200  static_transform_stamped.header.frame_id = "world"
201  static_transform_stamped.child_frame_id = frame.name
202  # Position
203  static_transform_stamped.transform.translation = Vector3(*frame.static_transform_stamped[0])
204  # Orientation
205  static_transform_stamped.transform.rotation = Quaternion(*frame.static_transform_stamped[1])
206 
207  # Add to the list of publish transform
208  self.dict_dynamic_frame[frame.name] = {"transform": static_transform_stamped}
209 
210  def callback_publisher(self, _event):
211  """
212  Callback publisher
213  """
214  current_time = rospy.Time.now()
215  for frame in list(self.dict_dynamic_frame.values()):
216  # Actualisation du temps
217  frame["transform"].header.stamp = current_time
218  try:
219  self.__broadcaster.sendTransform(frame["transform"])
220  except Exception as e:
221  rospy.logerr(frame)
222  raise e
223 
224  def publish_frames(self):
225  """
226  Publish frames
227  """
228  if self.__publish_timer is None:
229  self.__publish_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1), self.callback_publisher)
230 
231  def stop_publish_frames(self):
232  """
233  Stop Publishing frames
234  """
235  if isinstance(self.__publish_timer, rospy.Timer):
236  self.__publish_timer.shutdown()
237  self.__publish_timer = None
